name: BacteriaCausingEncephalitisTestsForBacteriaCausingEncephalitisNucleicAcidInUnspecifiedSpecimen
title: Bacteria [Causing Encephalitis] (Tests for Bacteria Causing Encephalitis Nucleic Acid in Unspecified Specimen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the Nucleic Acid of Encephalitis-causing Bacteria.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Encephalitis-causing Bacteria),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
